Headline: #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/9th Street
ShortDescription: NB 3 and 4 buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Balbo, and Michigan due to street blockage near Michigan/9th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Balbo, and Michigan due to street blockage near Michigan/9th Street.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ridgeland, 16th, Central, and Cermak due to street blockage near Cermak/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ridgeland, 16th, Central, and Cermak due to street blockage near Cermak/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
